name: Coloremix
description:
Mix and remix colors to create stable solutions.

Controls

Mouse for everything. Tutorial included.

Developer’s comments

Made in 12 effective hours (and ~2h for design). The simple idea worked well, I’m glad I went with it instead of the first, more complicated, idea.

It is pretty easy to cheese the later levels once you know the rules as there are no level specific goals.

Originally a Ludum Dare 43 entry:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/coloremix
